markdownPage.header_excerpt: The currency of the peer-to-peer internet, the ThreeFold Grid. Current value of TFT on ThreeFold Grid = $0.10

headerSolution2.subtitle: About ThreeFold
headerSolution2.excerpt: ThreeFold has developed the world's first decentralized cloud software platform that enables fully peer-to-peer and autonomous compute, storage, and network internet capacity. Our technology stack enables a decentralized internet capacity that ensures sovereignty, privacy, sustainability, ultimate security, and cost-efficiency. Additionally, this technology offers a truly decentralized architecture with humanless operations (autonomous) and self-healing capabilities.
headerSolution2.content: ThreeFold has developed the world's first decentralized cloud software platform that enables fully peer-to-peer and autonomous compute, storage, and network internet capacity. Our technology stack enables a decentralized internet capacity that ensures sovereignty, privacy, sustainability, ultimate security, and cost-efficiency. Additionally, this technology offers a truly decentralized architecture with humanless operations (autonomous) and self-healing capabilities.
